author: Dr15Jones
body:
The TrackingRecHitProducer was using EventSetup::iovSyncValue to
determine if it needed to update its cache from tracking geometry.
The proper way to do that is to use the cacheIdentifier from each
EventSetup record which is being used.

In addition, the EventSetup::iovSyncValue call will be removed
in the near future.
title: Removed EventSetup::iovSyncValue call from TrackingRecHitProducer
